Description: A bone bangle: with flattened upper and lower surfaces; the outer face is convex. There is no break in its circumference.
Curator's comments: Cf. W. M. F. Petrie, ‘Prehistoric Egypt’ (London, 1920), 31: pl.XXXI. Naqada I and Early Dynastic: A. Scharff, ‘Die Altertümer der Vor – und Frühzeit Ägyptens’, Staatliche Museen zu Berlin, Mitteilungen aus der ägyptischen Sammlung’ V (Berlin, 1931), 114, no. 194; pl.29, probably Predynastic; G. A. Reisner, ‘Archaeological Survey of Nubia, 1907-08’ (Cairo, 1910), pl.66b. no. 5. Early Dynastic or C-Group.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (112)
Acquisition notes: Apparently from the Tyszkiewicz Collection, no. 387, but not in 'Tyszkiewicz: vente'.
